name: Flash Preservation Project ️
description:
This is a archival of beloved and classic Flash Games! Here you can download a entire Zip file of flash games that several discord users requested. And some picked by myself. If you want to request a Flash Game to be added to the collection, please request at this Discord server.

--------------CREDITS AND USERS--------------

Blossom#2177 - The SWF file for the Flash port of Pac-Man.

HugoMeGa#3015 and his friends. - Ultimate Sonic Flash, Mario Combat Deluxe, AKR1 and AKR2, Super Mario Bros. Crossover

Sanssul#7512 - Tails' Nightmare 1 and Tails' Nightmare 2.

TheBlox - For making "Tails' Nightmare 1" and the sequels.

Lambtaco - For AKR1, AKR2 and the SMW Bowser Battle.
